definitions.title: vb. shatter
definitions.body: by a blow (As. ḫašâlu, shatter, perhaps thresh; NH [[חָשַׁל]] Pi. shatter: J Aram. [[חֲשַׁל]] forge, hammer, Syr. h.4al forge, furbish; Buhl:14 cp. Targum [[חוּשְׁלָא]] barley-groats (as pounded, beaten), and perh. As. ḫušlu, barley; Nö:M 135 cp. Ar. h.asala thrust, drive away (Frey), Targum [[נַחְשׁוֹל]] storm (y sea; cf. in Eng. beaten, buffetted by waves; As. loan-word Ba:ZA ii. 117), Syr. mah.4uwl id.);—
